title: Alibaba to attempt 'smarter' Olympic villages
text:
Alibaba to attempt 'smarter' Olympic villages Saturday, February 10, 2018 - 01:44 
Alibaba Group is launching a project that will create a ''smarter'' and more connected athletes' village and make all Olympics stakeholders ''more money'', its executives said on Saturday. Reuters Liana Baker reports from the event. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Alibaba Group is launching a project that will create a "smarter" and more connected athletes' village and make all Olympics stakeholders "more money", its executives said on Saturday.
